### Nepɛng    
Nepɛng na se kwɛng,<br>
Ne jut nerey<br>
Ko ne tik a ho byɛs<br>


Nepɛng na se nɛn<br>
Ne tɛ hwo ra pugu na wɛng<br>
Sede na tulus ho na ntey kawey<br>
Ko ba nɔng o re nuyel<br>
Hwa ye wey<br>
Hwo tɔk wo<br>


Nepɛng na se raku<br>
Kwon de ba tik ɛ badu reku<br>
Hwa vɔk dyam shinang wɛt<br>
Hwa vɔk dyam pyɛng wɛt<br>
Rawit mo a se dirik<br>
Yaga hwa wut mala nvit<br>


Nepɛng na se banɛn<br>
Sede beving ba ye wo be tos o<br>
Ko ceng ya se ra a ho won<br>
Sede ba nong nton kwon sangal<br>
Ko ba ro ho<br>
Sang ha a ho tsak o a gwa hom<br>


Nepɛng na se banɛn<br>
Bos ha tɛ ɛ gwom<br>
Tsak o a tɛ sam<br>
Tok ha sa yuu<br>
Netɔn na wunta nu<br>


Nepɛng na se banɛn<br>
Ba di o ba wɔk bengyip<br>
Be ra na ho sede gbik<br>
Nehywɛ mo na senge vok e vwel<br>
Neves mɛn na sene e ji yey<br>


Nepɛng na se banɛn<br><br>


### Poverty
Poverty is a hawk<br>
It takes away honour/glory<br>
And leaves you with disrespect<br>


Poverty is a crime<br>
It makes you fight against victory<br>
When it spits on you with the venom of a curse<br>
And when you're giving progress<br>
You say no<br>
You will know that<br>


Poverty is a mountain<br>
Where the law of death is kept<br>
You don't have gold<br>
You don't have silver<br>
Your waist is heavy<br>
Because you strapped the bag of emptiness<br>


Poverty is a crime<br>
When the excrement seeks to defecate you<br>
And demons are praying for you<br>
When stupidity is giving a seat<br>
But you're sent away<br>
Let me tell you the truth my brother/sister<br>


Poverty is a crime<br>
Falsehood became a king<br>
Truth became a slave<br>
Knowledge kept silent<br>
Ignorance roared<br>


Poverty is a crime<br>
They see you; fear engulfs them<br>
They treat you like a thief<br>
Your virtue corrodes to the ground<br>
Their vice awakens in the heart's deep sound<br>


Poverty is a crime<br>
